summary:
Standalone conversion of Crosscrusade Sexy Tsun's Amor to the 7B Cleavage Body
The Armor is divided into some pieces.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/9808/1yrt.jpg[/img][/center]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][color=Slategray] INTRODUCTION [/color][/size][/font][/b]
[size=3]This mod is a conversion of Crosscrusade Sexy Tsun's Amor to the 7B Cleavage Body
Is also a Mashup so the Armor is divided into some pieces.

The Armor is a standalone.
You can craft at the forge or type Help Sexy or help Tsun in the console.

For a better armor texture use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36336//?] aMidianBorn Tsun [/url][/size]


[b][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][color=Slategray] REQUIRED [/color][/size][/font][/b]
[size=3][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992//?] SeveNBase FemaleBody Replacer [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse!
[/size][b][color=crimson][size=3][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800//?]XP32[/url] - [/b]If you have CTD
[/size][/color][/b]
[b][font=Book Antiqua][color=Slategray][size=5]CREDITS[/size][/color][/font][/b]
[size=3]Special thanks to [b][color=Lightsteelblue] Crosscrusade [/color][/b] for making the [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34160/?] Sexy Tsun's Armor and many more! [/url][/b]
Please also endorse Crosscrusade armors!

Much thanks to [b][color=Lightsteelblue] Crosscrusade - Sevennity's - DeMoNhUnTeR1986 [/color][/b] for the 7B body and variations!

[b][color=Lightsteelblue] Nightasy [/color][/b] for making all the tutorials on 3ds MAX.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] Shockero [/color][/b] for giving me some finishing tips on converting amors.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] CaBaL120 [/color][/b] for the aMidianBorn Tsun and all of this other great textures.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] ewi65 [/color][/b] for the [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34966/?] E ENB. [/url][/b][/size]

[b][color=Lightsteelblue][size=4] My other conversions [/size][/color][/b]
[b][size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42292//?] Assault Armor - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45334/?] Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45344/?] Misfit Mage - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45427/?] Nightshade Armor - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url][/size][/b]
author: bla08
